OLE.interfaces package#

Submodules#

OLE.interfaces.cobaya_interface module#

OLE.interfaces.cobaya_interface.check_cache_and_compute(self, params_values_dict, dependency_params=None, want_derived=False, cached=True)#

Takes a dictionary of parameter values and computes the products needed by the likelihood, or uses the cached value if that exists for these parameters. If want_derived, the derived parameters are saved in the computed state (retrieved using current_derived).

params_values_dict can be safely modified and stored.

OLE.interfaces.cobaya_interface.emulate_samples(self, parameters, key)#
OLE.interfaces.cobaya_interface.evaluate_cobaya_pipeline(self, state)#
OLE.interfaces.cobaya_interface.test_emulator(self, emulator_state)#
OLE.interfaces.cobaya_interface.translate_cobaya_state_to_emulator_state(state)#
OLE.interfaces.cobaya_interface.translate_emulator_state_to_cobaya_state(old_cobaya_state, emulator_state)#

OLE.interfaces.gpjax_interface module#

OLE.interfaces.gpjax_interface.calculate_mean_single_from_inv_Kxx(self, test_inputs: Num[Array, 'N D'] | Num[ndarray, 'N D'], train_data: Dataset, inv_Kxx: Num[Array, 'N N'] | Num[ndarray, 'N N'])#
OLE.interfaces.gpjax_interface.compute_inv_Kxx(self, train_data: Dataset)#
